data.actual_result: Menu returns to the mentions: user option at the top of the screen (still can scroll up) - CNR on the "has" search option
data.expected_result: Full menu should return to the top
data.short_description: Backspacing a search option doesn't scroll back up to the top (reporting as per Dabbit's request)
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have an 18:9 phone, doesn't affect 16:9 phones - Open the search tool in a server - Tap on a search option - Backspace the whole thing
